nameEntry.part: University of Alberta. Department of Physical Therapy

biogHist.p: Physical Therapy was a division of the School of Physical and Occupational Therapy (later Rehabilitation Medicine) before becoming a department in 1976 under the Schoolþs new Faculty status. In 1969/70 its diploma program was replaced by a degree program; its first masterþs program began in 1979. Among the departmentþs activities are undergraduate, graduate and continuing education teaching, research, and public service. Heads: 1954-1962 John Richard Fowler; [1962]-1967 Ruth O.F. Bradshaw; 1967-1975 Alexander Gordon Faulds; 1975-1976 Barrie Pickles. Chairs: 1976-1979 Barrie Pickles; 1979-1980 Moyna Jeanette Parker; 1980- David J. Magee.
